NOTE

The pilots should be aware that the TAWS is a non-Rockwell Collins avionics unit. Since TAWS information is not generated by Rockwell Collins avionics units, it is subject to change by the vendor without notiﬁcation to Rockwell Collins. The Rockwell Collins avionics units described in this Operator’s Guide show typical operation and capabilities. The non-Rockwell Collins avionics units may or may not cause typical operation. Refer to the appropriate vendor documentation for speciﬁc details on the non-Rockwell Collins avionics units.

The terrain overlay is always shown on the DU Maps. The terrain overlay is removed if a TERRAIN FAIL condition exists.

SELECTIONS:

Absolute Terrain Absolute terrain is the depiction of terrain with respect to sea level elevation. Absolute terrain data ﬁlls the entire window area on the DU Map format. Absolute terrain is removed from the display in a TERRAIN FAIL condition.

Relative Terrain Relative terrain shows on the terrain overlay as deﬁned in the following table:
